hello.text: Good morning. Sorry to bother you, but there is something getting to my head.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: I'm loosing it ! My head. Literally.

how.name: What do you mean, your head ?
how.text: I can't move it as I should, it just drops like a dead weight.

what.name: What in the name of Chang'e happened to you ?
what.text: I would shrug if I could, nothing much.

what.name: What in the name of Chang'e happened to your head ?
what.text: I was heading to the human village when my head suddenly stopped floating.

check.name: Check her shoulders.
check.text: {i}She shivers as you touch her shoulders. Looks like she's in pain but doesn't want to admit it.{s}

manual.name: Attach her head back.
manual.text: {i}You try attaching her head back but it falls on the ground.{s}

manual.name: Attach her head back.
manual.text: {i}You put Sekibanki's head on the prosthesis you made for her. Looks like she'll need to keep it for a while.{s}

painkillers.name: Give her painkillers.
painkillers.text: It's fine, I can bear it.

prosthesis.name: Make a prosthesis to keep her head in place.
prosthesis.text: {i}This should keep her head in place while she recovers.{s}
